item.description:
A luxurious evening of the ultimate in pampering! A girls night out featuring mini organic body care treatments, infrared sauna, oxygen bar and simple, sustainable gift ideas for the holidays - this is what you call STRESS-FREE holiday shopping that is eco-conscious & FUN!

Bring a friend....spots are limited for treatments to the first 20 women so RSVP soon. $20 for treatments, includes sampling of the latest MamaLicious Raw Cacao Walnut Brittle infused with superfoods and some of you lucky ones win a bottle of Imani's new edible cacao body butter in the raffle. $10 entry includes infrared sauna, unlimited oxygen bar & chocolate (no mini treatments). Come one, come all ladies....it is our time to celebrate!sss
item.name: Holiday Raw Chocolate & Pamper Party!
